oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dick Crohn Job No. 37905
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm); Stoneman Family (Musical group); Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Travis, Merle; Perkins, Carl, 1932-1998; Wiseman, Mac; Hamilton, George, IV, 1937-;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 2433) for an order placed by Dick Crohn for 350 two color window cards for a performance by The Stoneman Family at the Golden Spike Club in St. Cloud, Minnesota on February 14-27, George Morgan at the Golden Spike Club in St. Cloud, Minnesota on March 1-6, Merle Travis at the Golden Spike Club in St. Cloud, Minnesota on March 8-13, Carl Perkins at the Golden Spike Club in St. Cloud, Minnesota on March 15-20, Mac Wiseman at the Golden Spike Club in St. Cloud, Minnesota on March 22-27, and George Hamilton IV at the Golden Spike Club in St. Cloud, Minnesota from March 29 to April 3. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
